# drawsBackground

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that controls whether the text field’s cell draws a background color behind the text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var drawsBackground: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the text field’s cell draws a background; if [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it draws nothing behind the text.

To prevent inconsistent rendering, `NSTextField` disables background color rendering for text fields with rounded bezels.

## Controlling the Background

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the background the text field’s cell draws behind the text.
- **isBezeled**: A Boolean value that controls whether the text field draws a bezeled background around its contents.
- **bezelStyle**: The text field’s bezel style, square or rounded.
- **NSTextField.BezelStyle**: The style of bezel the text field displays.
